footer.cs.title: Customer Service
footer.acc.title: Your Account
footer.sistic.intro: SISTIC is the largest ticketing service and solution provider in Singapore. It sells tickets to events ranging from pop concerts, musicals, theatre, family entertainment to sports. SISTIC's Authorised Agents are now conveniently located in Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Taiwan and Vietnam.
footer.browser: Best viewed with IE 8.0, 9.0, Firefox 16 and Google Chrome 23.
footer.copyright: Copyright Â©1998 - 2017. SISTIC.com Pte Ltd. All Rights Reserved. Designated trademarks, pictures and brands are the property of their respective owners. Use of this Web site constitutes acceptance of the SISTIC's Conditions of Access and Privacy Policy.

Your password is incorrect. If you have forgotten your password, please click on the "Retrieve Password" link.

You have exceeded the maximum number of tries allowed and your account has been locked.

cart.items.promo-msg.text: Enjoy booking fee waiver on selected events when you book tickets online with your Standard Chartered Mastercard card!
cart.items.delivery.text.VENUE_COLLECTIO: Collection from Event Venue on event day 1 hour before show time (SGD 1.50)
cart.items.delivery.option.OUTLET_PICKUP: Collection from Singapore Authorised Agents - SGD 0.50
cart.items.delivery.text.OUTLET_PICKUP: - Your ticket(s) is available for Your collection only at Singapore SISTIC Authorised Agents. Check Agent location and operation hours here (SGD 0.50)
cart.items.delivery.text.COURIER: - Courier is a door to door service available through a third party provider. SISTIC will be contacting you to arrange for delivery once the tickets are ready. Courier delivery is a Sign-for service that requires a signature on delivery.
cart.items.delivery.text.E_TICKET: Download and print your E-ticket(s) via the "Download E-ticket(s)" link in your confirmation email after completing your transaction - SGD 0.00 (For more information)
cart.items.delivery.title.MASTERCARD_PIC: Collection from Singapore Authorised Agents - Payment by MasterCard (SGD 0.00)
cart.items.delivery.text.MASTERCARD_PICK: - Purchases made with MasterCard enjoy a waiver of the SGD 0.50 pickup charge when you collect your tickets from any Singapore SISTIC Authorised Agent before proceeding for the event.
cart.items.delivery.text.REGISTERED_MAIL: - Registered Mail is available through Singpost and will take up to 7 working days. Registered Mailing is a Sign-For service that requires a signature on delivery.
cart.items.delivery.option.MAIL_WORLD_EL: Registered Mail - Payment by World & World Elite MasterCard (SGD 0.00)
cart.items.delivery.title.MAIL_WORLD_ELI: Registered Mail - Payment by World & World Elite MasterCard (SGD 0.00)
cart.items.delivery.text.MAIL_WORLD_ELIT: - Purchases made with World & World Elite MasterCard enjoy a waiver of the SGD 3.00 registered mail charge. Registered Mail is available through Singpost and will take up to 7 working days. Registered Mailing is a Sign-For service that requires a signature on delivery.
cart.items.delivery.text.VENUE_COLLECTIO: Collection from Event Venue (MasterCard) on event day 1 hour before show time (SGD 0.00)
cart.items.delivery.text.PANGDEMONIUM_MA:
Pangdemonium will mail your Season Ticket card within 7-10 working days after purchase.

Early Bird purchases will be mailed within the first two weeks of November 2015
cart.items.delivery.option.OUTLET_PICKUP: Collection from Singapore Indoor Stadium Box Office - SGD 0.20
cart.items.delivery.text.OUTLET_PICKUP_S: Collection from Singapore Indoor Stadium Box Office no later than 1 day (by 8pm) before show time (SGD 0.20)
cart.items.delivery.text.EMAIL_CONFIRMAT: Please proceed to the security counter at CityHall wing and present your identification Card and email confirmation. For enquiries, email us at info@nationalgallery.sg or call us at 6690 9400.
cart.items.delivery.text.KIOSK_PICKUP: Collection from iNETS Kiosk no later than 1 day (by 8pm) before show time (SGD 0.20)
cart.items.delivery.option.OUTLET_PICKUP: Collection from Resorts World Sentosa - SGD 0.50
cart.items.delivery.text.OUTLET_PICKUP_R: Collection from Resorts World Sentosa 1 hour before show time (SGD 0.20)
cart.items.delivery.option.VENUE_COLLECT: Collection from Resorts World Sentosa on event day - SGD 0.20
cart.items.delivery.text.VENUE_COLLECTIO: Collection from Resorts World Sentosa on event day 1 hour before show time (SGD 0.20)
cart.items.delivery.text.OUTLET_PICKUP_M: Venue collection on event day 1 hour before show time (SGD 0.00)
cart.items.delivery.option.LKC_COLLECTIO: Collection at Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum Counter - SGD 0.00
cart.items.delivery.text.LKC_COLLECTION: Collection at Lee Kong Chian Natural History Museum Counter
cart.items.delivery.text.MAIL: - Mailing is available through Singpost and will take up to 7 working days. Please note that SISTIC is not liable for undelivered mail.
cart.items.delivery.option.OUTLET_PICKUP: Collection from Singapore Indoor Stadium SISTIC Box Office - SGD 3.00
cart.items.delivery.text.OUTLET_PICKUP_S: Collection from Singapore Indoor Stadium SISTIC Box Office (SGD 3.00)
cart.items.delivery.text.NO_TICKETS_ISSU: No tickets issued. Please refer to your Booking Confirmation for more details.
cart.items.delivery.text.NO_TICKETS_REQU: No tickets required. You will be contacted by SRT's Friends administrator within 10 working days regarding your membership programme and its entitlements.
cart.items.delivery.option.VENUE_COLLECT: Collection from Event Venue - Payment by Standard Chartered MasterCard Credit or Debit Card - SGD 0.00

cart.items.delivery.text.VENUE_COLLECTIO: - Collect your ticket(s) at the venue starting from one hour before the event time.

cart.items.delivery.text.MAIL_MC_WAIVER: - Enjoy waiver of standard mail delivery fee of SGD 1.50 when you book tickets with Standard Chartered MasterCard Credit or Debit Card. cart.ticket-protect.title: Ticket Protector
cart.ticket-protect.text: Protect the value of your event tickets with Ticket Protector. It insures your tickets in case you and your companion(s) are unable to attend an event. Click here for
cart.ticket-protect.yes.radio: Yes, I want to add Ticket Protector for only
cart.ticket-protect.no.radio: No thanks, I am sure I will be able to attend the event
cart.ticket-protect.tnc: By including Ticket Protector, you acknowledge that you have read the Policy Wording, that you understand Ticket Protector is offered by Allianz Global Assistance, and that it is underwritten by Tokio Marine Insurance Singapore Ltd. SISTIC shall not be liable for any loss, damage or expense in relation to Ticket Protector.

cart.evoucher.text: If you have SISTIC eVoucher for this event, please enter in the field box below and click Apply Voucher.
cart.evoucher.label: SISTIC eVoucher(s):
cart.evoucher.bubble: Key in your eVoucher here. Click "add" if you have more than 3 eVouchers to redeem.

error.cart.evoucher.apply.popup.text: There are error in apply the vouchers. Please try again.
cart.evoucher.full-redeem.popup.title: Full Redemption
cart.evoucher.full-redeem.popup.text: Your tickets are fully redeemed with your eVouchers. Please note that you are not allowed to select ticket protector and no refunds will be given for any excess value. No payment is required for this transaction, please proceed to confirm order.
error.cart.evoucher.limited: Only 10 E-voucher can be applied per Transaction, Please remove the extra E-voucher(s) and try again.
Sorry, your E-voucher does not exist in our records. Please check and try entering your E-voucher again.
error.cart.evoucher.basic.fail: Sorry, your E-voucher does not exist in our records. Please check and try entering your E-voucher again.
error.cart.evoucher.basic.redeemed: I'm sorry, this E-voucher has already been redeemed. Please contact the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 if you have not redeemed this previously.
error.cart.evoucher.violate.ownership: Patron account number doesn't match with patron account number of E-Voucher.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.restriction-wit: E-Voucher cannot be used, E-Voucher Payment method is not configured in Event/Product and User Profile.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.restriction-out: E-Voucher cannot be used, Only E-Voucher Payment method that is not found in Event/Product and User Profile can be used.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.restriction-all: E-Voucher cannot be used or redeemed due the Restrict-All rules applied to it.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.use-with-other: Only 1 E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Please remove the extra e-voucher(s) and try again.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.max-qty: Only 1 E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Please remove the extra e-voucher(s) and try again.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.not-allowed: E-Voucher can not be used with this payment method.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.not-with-credit: E-Voucher cannot be used with this Credit Card.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.pass: Pass (E-voucher passed all rules that are applied for it).
error.cart.evoucher.type.not-implemented: The E-Voucher rule is not implemented.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.org-id-fail: Organization ID of E-Voucher doesn't match with Organization ID of rule.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.ocbc-not-with-o: Only 1 OCBC E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Note: OCBC E-Vouchers does not work with other vouchers. If you wish to use other E-Vouchers, please remove the OCBC E-Voucher.
error.cart.evoucher.rule.ocbc-only-one: Only 1 OCBC E-Voucher can be applied per Transaction. Note: OCBC E-Vouchers does not work with other vouchers. If you wish to use other E-Vouchers, please remove the OCBC E-Voucher.

cart.payment.scb.no-waive.label: The event(s) that you have selected is/are not participating in the SISTIC booking fee waiver promotion with Standard Chartered. Booking fee of {{fee}} will be charged accordingly.
cart.payment.scb.full-waive.label: Your total SISTIC booking fee of {{fee}} is waived, courtesy of Standard Chartered MasterCard Card! Full details of your final bill will be reflected in the confirmation email.
cart.payment.scb.partial-waive.label: Part of your purchase qualifies for a SISTIC booking fee waiver of {{fee}}, courtesy of Standard Chartered MasterCard Card! Full details of your final bill will be reflected in the confirmation email.
cart.subscription.title: Subscription
cart.subscription.text: I wish to receive marketing information by email from, and agree to the collection, use and disclosure of my personal data for such marketing by:
cart.subscription.item.03.chk: Venue Manager(s) for the event(s) purchased
cart.tnc.title: Conditions of Sale, Use of Personal Data:
cart.tnc.accept.chk: I have read and accept SISTIC Terms & Conditions of Sale and consent to:
cart.tnc.list.01: the collection of my personal data by SISTIC both in its own capacity, and as ticketing agent and data intermediary of the promoter(s) and venue manager(s) of the event(s) purchased; and
cart.tnc.list.02: the collection, use and disclosure of such personal data by SISTIC, its agents and the promoter(s) and venue manager(s) ,
cart.tnc.last.text: in accordance with SISTIC's Privacy Policy. No refund or exchange of tickets is allowed once your booking is confirmed.
cart.confirm.title: Confirm Order
cart.confirm.text: Please click OK to proceed with the payment and wait for your confirmation page to be displayed. You will also receive a booking confirmation via email after a successful transaction.
cart.confirm.payment-queue.text: You are now in the payment queue
cart.confirm.error.invalid-cc-for-paymen: Invalid credit card for payment method
cart.confirm.incomplete.popup.title: Incomplete Fields
cart.confirm.incomplete.popup.text: Please complete the field(s) highlighted in red:
cart.confirm.incomplete.tnc.popup.error: Please accept SISTIC's Conditions of Sale & Use of Data to continue.
cart.confirm.incomplete.blockno.popup.er: Block No. / Hse No. / Street Name
cart.confirm.incomplete.ticket-protector: Please choose if you would like to include Ticket Protector coverage for your tickets.
cart.payment.invalid-card.error: We are unable to process your payment. Please ensure that your credit card number and/or expiry date is correct. If this problem persists, please call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
cart.payment.wrong-card.error: You have chosen to collect your tickets with the Free MasterCard Pickup. Please ensure that you are making payment by MasterCard.
cart.payment.queue.label: You are now in the payment queue
cart.payment.queue.error.title: Error
cart.payment.queue.error.text: There was an error while waiting in the queue. Please try again or contact (65) 6348 5555 for futher assistance.
cart.confirm.redirect.text: Your credit card is protected by a highly secure authentication system (3-D Secure). To ensure the security of your online booking transaction, verification checks are currently being carried out by your card issuer. Your patience is appreciated.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.01: If redirection does not occur in 10 seconds, please do not close this browser. Follow the steps below to proceed with your payment.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.02: Click the Shopping Cart tab at the top of the webpage.
cart.confirm.redirect.fail-steps.item.03: If the tickets selected are displayed in the shopping cart, click the "Proceed to Payment" button to complete your transaction.
error.expires.popup.title: Sorry! Time limit exceeded!
error.expires.popup.text: You have exceeded the 15 minute time limit to complete this booking. Please try again.
cart.countdown.label: Time left to complete purchase
cart.post-commit.error: An error has occurred and we are unable to process your payment. Please try again or call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
error.cart.cross-cart.title: Complete Booking Session
error.cart.confirm.card-payment: Invalid credit card for payment method
error.cart.confirm.card-payment.fail: An error has occurred and we are unable to process your payment. Please try again or call the SISTIC Hotline at (65) 6348 5555 for assistance.
cart.masterpass.popup.title: Masterpass Notification
cart.masterpass.cancelled.popup.text: Your MasterPass request was unsuccessful. Please try again or proceed to make payment with your credit card.

error.cart.payment.popup.fail.text: Can't process payment. Please try again or choose other payment method

orderconfirm.bookref.acc-no.label: SISTIC Account No.

orderconfirm.collection.title: TICKET(S) COLLECTION
orderconfirm.collection.text.01: Please collect your ticket(s) at any of our Singapore SISTIC Authorised Agents before proceeding to the venue.
orderconfirm.collection.text.02: Check Agent location and operation hours here.
orderconfirm.collection.note.title: Note:
orderconfirm.collection.note.text.01: For Verification purposes, kindly present the following upon collection:-
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.01a: i. Credit card used in this transaction
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.01c: iii. Clear print out of this email confirmation
orderconfirm.collection.note.text.02: For a proxy to collect on your behalf, he/she needs to present:-
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.02a: i. This Letter of Authorization (duly completed and signed by Credit Cardholder)
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.02b: ii. Clear photocopy of Credit Cardholder's photo identification card such as NRIC/Passport/FIN Card
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.02c: iii. Clear photocopy of the front of Credit Card used for the purchase
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.02d: iv. Proxy's original photo identification card such as NRIC/Passport/FIN Card
orderconfirm.collection.note.item.02.not: * Strictly no replacement of tickets for General Admission events
orderconfirm.collection.important-note.t: SISTIC reserve the right not to release tickets if the above documents are not in order.
orderconfirm.refund.title: REFUND EXCHANGE POLICY
orderconfirm.refund.text: No refund or exchange of tickets is allowed once booking is confirmed.
orderconfirm.thanks.text: Thank you for booking with SISTIC.

patron.register.tnc.news.title: Sistic: Get your BUZZ online.
patron.register.tnc.news.text: Hear from us via your inbox with SISTIC Buzz and Buzz Specials. Get the latest on new events starting sale, promotions, discounts or contests.
patron.register.tnc.news.checkbox.label: SISTIC.com Pte Ltd
patron.register.tnc.captcha.error: Enter the text you see above. Please note that it is case-sensitive.
patron.register.tnc.main.checkbox.label: I agree that SISTIC may collect my personal data both in its own capacity, and as ticketing agent and data imtermediary of promoters and venue managers of events for which I purchase tickets. My personal data may be collected, used, processed and disclosed by SISTIC, its agents and the above parties in accordance with SISTIC'TMs Privacy Policy. I further confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete.
patron.register.tnc.main.checkbox.error: Please tick the checkbox above to continue

patron.subscriptions.main.title: Be the first in line.
patron.subscriptions.main.content: Stay on top of the latest entertainment news and be the first to know what events and shows are happening near you. You can choose to get your feeds from us, our show organisers or the event venues. Or better yet, sign up for all three. You can unsubscribe at any time.
patron.subscriptions.main.checkbox.label: Check the boxes to receive updates from:
patron.subscriptions.tenant.content: You will receive the SISTIC Buzz, a fortnightly newsletter featuring a comprehensive list of events ticketed through us.
patron.subscriptions.tenant.includes.tex: Online promotions with prizes waiting to be won
patron.subscriptions.tenant.includes.lab: More than 500,000 people read SISTIC Buzz, so don't miss out!
In addition, SISTIC may also send you information on exciting events, promotions and other related products and services offered by show organisers or reputable third parties.
